name: natural gas, high pressure, import from BO | natural gas, high pressure | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/24975/documentation

This dataset describes the transport needed for the export of Bolivian natural gas (expressed in tkm). Gas losses and emissions during seasonal storage are extrapolated from the ‘natural gas, high pressure, import from NO’ dataset for The Netherlands, valid for the year of 2012, available in database version 3.6. The GASBOL onshore pipeline distance is 557 km for the export on the Bolivian side, i.e., the length of the Bolivian pipeline section (MME, 2018).;[MME 2018];Ministry of Mines and Energy (2019). Monthly Bulletin of the Natural Gas Industry. December 2018. Edition number 142. Available at: http://www.mme.gov.br/web/guest/secretarias/petroleo-gas-natural-ebiocombustiveis/publicacoes/boletim-mensal-de-acompanhamento-da-industria-de-gas-natural. Accessed in: 10/06/2020.;Characteristics are based on the ecoinvent report v2 'Erdgas' from 2007: HV; 44.21 MJ/m-3; density, 0.84 kg/m-3, 0.719 kg CH4/m-3, 0.013 kg CO2/m-3

'exit gate' of natural gas production field

'entry gate' of natural gas national market (i.e., at the BO-BR border)
category: H:Transportation and storage/49:Land transport and transport via pipelines/493:Transport via pipeline/4930:Transport via pipeline

processDocumentation.timeDescription: Pipeline distance and production are updated to the year of 2018. Gas losses and emissions during seasonal storage are extrapolated from the ‘natural gas, high pressure, import from NO’ dataset for The Netherlands, valid for the year of 2012, available in database version 3.6. Data is assumed to be valid from 2018 to 2021.
processDocumentation.dataTreatmentDescription: Gas losses and emissions during seasonal storage are extrapolated from the ‘natural gas, high pressure, import from NO’ dataset for The Netherlands, valid for the year of 2012, available in database version 3.6. The uncertainties were adjusted accordingly.
processDocumentation.samplingDescription:
The distance of the GASBOL pipeline, which connects Bolivian production fields to the Brazilian boarder, is reported in the Monthly Bulletin of the Natural Gas Industry (MME, 2018).
Reference:
[MME 2018] 
Ministry of Mines and Energy (2019). Monthly Bulletin of the Natural Gas Industry. December 2018. Edition number 142. Available at: http://www.mme.gov.br/web/guest/secretarias/petroleo-gas-natural-ebiocombustiveis/publicacoes/boletim-mensal-de-acompanhamento-da-industria-de-gas-natural. Accessed in: 10/06/2020.

dataGenerator.name: F. Valebona; T. B. Rocha; F. L. Motta
